method: In a mixing bowl, combine the transparent flour, crystal clear oil, and invisible salt.
Divide the dough into small balls and roll them out into translucent tortillas.
Heat a pan over medium heat and cook the tortillas until lightly browned.
In another pan, heat the opaque beans until warm.
Layer the translucent tortillas with semi-transparent salsa, warm opaque beans, and translucent cheese.
Fold the tortillas in half to form tacos.
Serve the translucent tacos with a side of invisible guacamole for a truly unique dining experience.
